Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to self-exclusion provisions
Summary: Relates to self-exclusion provisions; provides for moneys forfeited by self-exclusion to be deposited in certain gaming commission accounts.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to improvement of the self-exclusion provisions
